responses.rationale: The segment reports a negative fact (infection) but contains no explicit calming language or intensified low-risk statement.
The segment reports a negative fact (infection) and context but contains no explicit calming language or intensified low-risk statement.
The segment reports facts about the case including recovery, but lacks explicit calming language or intensified low-risk statement.
The segment reports a negative fact (previous cases) but contains no explicit calming language or intensified low-risk statement.
The segment reports negative facts (previous cases, symptoms) but lacks explicit calming language or intensified low-risk statement.
